page.title: 09PEAK PARK INFORMATION CENTRE
page.content: This is at Field Head at Edale.It is the headquarters of 4 full time and some part-time Peak Park Rangers. Visitors,torists,walkers and climbers go for information on the Peak Park, weather,ecology,mountains,wild-life etc.Exibitions are held.Films are shown.There is a camp-site for groups and individuals. {Mountain Rescue}The centre is also a Mountain Rescue Post. {Equpment}Folding strechers with runners.First Aid Kit.Sleeping bag. Tent.Ropes.Flares.Note book.Map. Compass.Helmets.Ice-axes.The rescue team keeps in touch by 2 way radio. There is also a powerful radio at the centre.Dogs are sometimes used for finding lost walkers.Helicopters may be used in rescues.The Mountain Rescue gets about 50 calls a year.
